meanings.definition: To recover one's health and strength after illness or injury.
meanings.sent1: After being sick, she is slowly convalescing at home.
meanings.sent2: The patient is convalescing well after the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to be convalescing from its 'flu' too.
meanings.sent4: Like a wounded soldier, he is convalescing from battle.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden are convalescing after the storm, blooming again.

meanings.definition: The process of recovering one's health and strength after illness or injury.
meanings.sent1: His convalescing was a relief to his worried family.
meanings.sent2: The convalescing of the athlete took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The convalescing of the computer system was a slow and tedious process.
meanings.sent4: The convalescing of the economy after the crisis was gradual.
meanings.sent5: The convalescing of the old building brought new life to the neighborhood.
